Hello,

My iPhone 12 has the above problem:

Hello,
We had ordered two iPhones 12 in the condition 'very good'. Unfortunately, the condition is not up to par.
The scratches are massive on both iPhones.
Under the condition that the devices function properly, I would be agreeable to a price reduction or an exchange of the devices.
With friendly regards,
Thomas Keller

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

We will make a partial refund of €60.00 to the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Fabio from Back Market
